name: Dvalin
desc:
"Dragon of the East" Dvalin

"How wonderful it would have been if you were as I, witnessing your noble, beautiful form as you soared through the blue sky."

"Then you would know that this sky and this earth are both things worth fighting for."

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Dvalin's Whisper

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow.?" "Many in Mondstadt know the story of the Dragon of the East and the Anemo Archon, Barbatos. But we also wonder â€” what does the Dragon's voice sound like?"
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Dvalin" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Rending Vortex" equipped. End Phase: Attach "Total Collapse" to your active character.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Serious Showdown - Dvalin's Melody

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow?" "It is said that the Dragon of the East uses its claws to strike down evildoers. The sound of such enormous claws being swung must be very deep and low indeed..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Dvalin" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Rending Vortex" equipped. End Phase: Attach "Total Collapse" to your active character.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> . The target character receives <color=#ffffff>Total Collapse</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Total Collapse</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> or <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> taken by the affected character increased by 2.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> and then separately performs " <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> " for <color=#ffffff>Perpetual Cleansing</color> and <color=#ffffff>Ultimate Cleansing</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Perpetual Cleansing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 1 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> to the next opposing character on standby. After this, <color=#ffffff>Prepare Skill</color> : <color=#ffffff>Ultimate Cleansing</color> . (If there are no opposing characters on standby, deals DMG to active character instead)
<color=#ece5d8>Ultimate Cleansing</color>
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> to the previous opposing character on standby. (If there are no opposing characters on standby, deals DMG to the active character instead)

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 5 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> . Applies <color=#ffffff>Total Collapse</color> to all opposing standby characters.
<color=#ece5d8>Total Collapse</color>
<color=#ffd780>Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>Physical DMG</color> or <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> taken by the affected character increased by 2.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 1</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl:</color> Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
<color=#ece5d8>Prepare Skill</color>
Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.
When it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#ffffff>prepared</color> , the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)
Only active characters can <color=#ffffff>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#ffffff>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#ffffff>preparation</color> will be interrupted.

value.name: Rending Vortex
value.desc:
Dvalin: Rending Vortex

But never forget that dust can be wiped away, and the power of doubt and poison can be shattered.

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Dvalin

value.name: Stormterror
value.desc:
One of The Four Winds of Mondstadt: Dvalin, the Dragon of the East.
With the passage of long years and amid boundless darkness, even the purest gem will become dulled by dust, and even the noble dragon might be corrupted and cankered by hatred.
But never forget that dust can be wiped away, and the power of doubt and poison can be shattered.

"Fly freely in the sky.
"Just like you did in those days when we met, when I walked upon this land and sang the songs of the wind,
"And you soared on high, looking down on the world from above.
"Today, the sky is no longer swept by wind and snow. The green grass grows all over the earth, and it is beautiful.
"If you too could walk the earth and listen to the songs of shepherds and the scattered sound of wind chimes in the distance, if you could have tasted wine as sweet as honey, you would understand.
"How wonderful it would have been if you were as I, witnessing your noble, beautiful form as you soared through the blue sky.
"Then you would know that this sky and this earth are both things worth fighting for."
